attributes.action: give soldiers the compensation and care they deserve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: our brave solidiers fighting in afganistan are being treated disgracefully by this government,if billions can be found to bail out the banks then money can be found to give the soldiers the compensation and care they deserve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
